text: Ultimate Air Shuttle is an airline from the United States. It's main hub is at Cincinnati. It's first flight was in July 2009. The airline is a shuttle because it flies many flights a day between the cities it goes to. ==Destinations== *Charlotte - Charlotte Douglas International Airport *Chicago, Illinois - Chicago Midway International Airport *Cincinnati - Lunken Field and Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport *Martha's Vineyard - Martha's Vineyard Airport *Nantucket - Nantucket Memorial Airport *New York City - Morristown Municipal Airport ==References== Category:Airlines of the United States Category:Companies based in Ohio Category:Cincinnati Category:2009 establishments in the United States
title: Ultimate Air Shuttle
